import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const PaymentVoucher = ({onSubmit}) => { const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); return (

Payment Voucher

Amount in Words
Prepared by Approved by Payee

); }; export default PaymentVoucher;
